settlementSummary: Settlements confirm on L1 in 12 minutes with 3 watcher(s).

sequencer.decentralizationPlan: Progressively activate additional sequencer keys via governance, rotating keys each epoch with automated proof verification.

guardrails: Run bridge settlement verification every epoch and attest results to governance ledger.
Hold >= 110% liquidity buffer in the mainnet treasury for L2 settlement backstops.
Trigger sequencer key rotation if latency exceeds 90th percentile for 15 minutes.
Escalate to governance safe if bridge watchers report anomaly severity > 2.

playbooks.name: Bridge emergency pause
playbooks.objective: Pause rollup bridge on anomaly and route settlements back to mainnet.

playbooks.name: Sequencer failover
playbooks.objective: Rotate sequencer key set via multi-sig and resynchronise watchers.

playbooks.name: L2 liquidity top-up
playbooks.objective: Refill bridge liquidity from mainnet treasury buffers when utilisation > 80%.

readinessFactors.label: Bridge audit coverage
readinessFactors.description: Latest bridge audit completed Jan 2025 by Sigma Prime with zero critical findings.

readinessFactors.label: Sequencer failover drills
readinessFactors.description: Quarterly rotation drills underway; 3 of 4 rehearsals executed with validated proofs.

readinessFactors.label: Data availability pipeline
readinessFactors.description: EigenDA service level integrated with redundancy mirrors across three geographies.

readinessFactors.label: Liquidity backstop
readinessFactors.description: Mainnet treasury commits 15M AGI liquidity buffer with automated refill triggers.

readinessFactors.label: Compliance protocol
readinessFactors.description: Jurisdictional review complete; attestations logged on-chain for regulator portal.

readinessFactors.label: Agent migration mesh
readinessFactors.description: Agent gateway beta routed 72% of workloads through Arbitrum mirrored APIs.

commentary: Layer-2 mesh ready for production pilot with bridge guardrails, sequencer rotations, and compliance telemetry wired into the owner autopilot.
recommendedActions: Complete readiness factor: Sequencer failover drills.
Complete readiness factor: Agent migration mesh.
